price: 19. Ma mid og in waxa lagaaga soo dejiyey xagga Rabbigaa uu yahay Xaq baa la mid ah mid ka indha la'? Waase oo keliya dadka wax garadka ah kuwa waansami.
arabic: ۞ أَفَمَن يَعۡلَمُ أَنَّمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ ٱلۡحَقُّ كَمَنۡ هُوَ أَعۡمَىٰٓۚ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: afaman yaʿlamu annamā unzila ilayka min rabbika al-ḥaqu kaman huwa aʿmā innamā yatadhakkaru ulū al-albābi
